text.config.celestemod.option.dash_treas:
Controls if the Dash enchantment is regarded as treasure or not. 
Treasure enchantments cannot be obtained in an Enchanting Table
text.config.celestemod.option.dash_veloc: Be careful with the velocity, it gets very big very fast
text.config.celestemod.option.default_da: Default number of dashes the player has (without the dash enchantment)
text.config.celestemod.option.max_dash_l:
Maximum level you can get for the dash enchantment.
There is no functional limit on the enchantment's level,
this setting controls the maximum obtainable level.
text.config.celestemod.title: Celeste Config
text.config.celestemod.option.dash_slowd: Multiplied by the current velocity at the end of the dash.
